title: Graphic Design Fundamentals
short_description: Master the core principles of graphic design, including color theory, typography, and layout.
detailed_description: This course uses Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to teach you the foundational skills every designer needs. You'll create logos, posters, and web layouts to build a strong portfolio.

instructor.name: Maria Garcia
instructor.bio: A freelance graphic designer with clients like Nike and Coca-Cola.

title: The Complete MERN Stack Bootcamp 2025
short_description: Become a full-stack web developer by mastering the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).
detailed_description: This comprehensive bootcamp covers everything from front-end development with React to back-end development with Node.js and Express. You'll build multiple real-world projects and gain the skills needed to land a job in the tech industry. Perfect for beginners and intermediate developers.

instructor.name: Tanvir Rahman
instructor.bio: A passionate full-stack developer with 8+ years of experience.

title: React Native: Build Cross-Platform Mobile Apps
short_description: Use your React knowledge to build native mobile apps for both iOS and Android with React Native.
detailed_description: Leverage your web development skills to enter the world of mobile development. This course teaches you how to build beautiful and performant mobile apps from a single JavaScript codebase.
learning_outcomes: Build apps for iOS and Android
Manage complex state in mobile apps

instructor.name: Johnathan Doe
instructor.bio: A full-stack developer specializing in mobile.

title: Digital Marketing Masterclass: From Zero to Hero
short_description: Learn everything you need to become a successful digital marketer, from SEO to social media marketing.
detailed_description: This course covers all aspects of digital marketing, including SEO, SEM, Content Marketing, Email Marketing, and Social Media Advertising. Perfect for business owners, students, or anyone looking to start a career in marketing.

instructor.name: Tanvir A.
instructor.bio: A growth hacker with a track record of scaling startups.

title: Photography Masterclass: A Complete Guide
short_description: Learn how to take stunning photographs, from understanding your camera to post-processing.
detailed_description: This masterclass covers camera settings, composition, lighting, and editing techniques in Adobe Lightroom. Suitable for DSLR, mirrorless, and even smartphone photographers.

title: Introduction to Cloud Computing with AWS
short_description: Learn the basics of cloud computing and get hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS).
detailed_description: This course is designed for absolute beginners. We will cover core AWS services like EC2, S3, and Lambda. You'll learn how to deploy and manage applications in the cloud.

title: Advanced Python for Data Science & AI
short_description: Unlock the power of Python for complex data analysis, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.
detailed_description: This course is for those who already know Python basics. We will dive deep into libraries like Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, and TensorFlow to build advanced predictive models and AI solutions. You'll work on real datasets from Kaggle.
learning_outcomes: Build and evaluate machine learning models

instructor.name: Dr. Aisha Khan
instructor.bio: PhD in Computer Science, specializing in AI.

title: UI/UX Design Essentials with Figma
short_description: Learn the fundamentals of UI/UX design and create beautiful, user-friendly interfaces with Figma.
detailed_description: This course will take you through the entire design process, from user research and wireframing to creating high-fidelity prototypes and design systems in Figma. No prior design experience is required.

title: iOS Development with Swift & SwiftUI
short_description: Build beautiful, native iOS applications using Apple's modern frameworks, Swift and SwiftUI.
detailed_description: From the very basics to advanced topics like Core Data and networking, this course will guide you through building your very own iOS app and publishing it to the App Store.

instructor.name: David Chen
instructor.bio: An iOS developer with over 10 apps on the App Store.

title: The Business of Entrepreneurship
short_description: Learn the essential frameworks for launching and growing a successful business from scratch.
detailed_description: This course covers business model creation, market validation, fundraising, and scaling. Taught by a seasoned entrepreneur who has successfully built and sold multiple companies.
prerequisites: An idea and a passion to build
